channel.title: Jenkins on Raphael Borges
channel.description: Recent content in Jenkins on Raphael Borges

item.title: Jenkins Rundeck Plugin
item.description: In 2011, I wrote a Jenkins plugin to integrate Rundeck as a “publisher”: the Rundeck plugin. This plugin allows the creation of continuous delivery pipelines, using Jenkins to build your software and Rundeck to deploy it. I talked about it at the Paris DevOps meetup in march 2011: Continuous Deployment with Jenkins and Rundeck. Note that this plugin is now maintained by the Rundeck team, and is still used by many people.
